title: Alaric
body:
Alaric

"Ugh, Why is this guy so cautious? It's not like anyone would dare to attack him in his territory." A beautiful woman with long black hair grumbled in annoyance as she walked through a dense forest.

The woman's black eyes were glowing brightly and her irises were star-shaped, slowly spinning.

"Damn, another trap..." The woman suddenly stopped walking and sighed while looking at a small formation on the ground with her glowing eyes.

"For God's sake, that guy is a Rank Six core evolver with millions of monsters under his command, so why does he act like a coward..." Anastasia said in an irritated voice and smashed the formation with a ball of black energy, completely isolating it from the outside world.

Once the formation was isolated, Anastasia walked past it and continued moving deeper.
